alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 7:22PM CST until February 08 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Eastern Alexander County in southern Illinois... West central Ballard County in western Kentucky... Northern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 745 PM CST. * At 721 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Charleston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wyatt around 730 PM CST. Cairo and Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area around 735 PM CST. Mounds and Mound City around 740 PM CST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 12. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 3 and 21. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 71 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
